D35E.title: Pathfinder 1
D35E.description: Ein umfassendes Spielsystem zum Ausführen von Spielen von Pathfinder 1 in der Foundry VTT-Umgebung.
SETTINGS.D35EDiagL: Konfiguration, welche Diagonalbewegungsregel für Spiele innerhalb dieses Systems verwendet werden soll.
SETTINGS.D35EInitTBL: Anfügen der Geschicklichkeit, um in der Initiative ein Unentschieden besser zu erkennen.
SETTINGS.D35EMeasureStyleL: Verwende den Messungsstil von Pathfinder anstelle des Standardstils von FoundryVTT
D35E.FlagsInstructions: Konfiguration der Charakterfähigkeiten und -eigenschaften die das Verhalten des D35E-Systems fein abstimmen.
D35E.ErrorNoActorPermission: Du hast keine Rechte den Aktor zu kontrollieren
D35E.DeleteItemConfirmation: Willst du dieses Item wirklich entfernen?
D35E.Name: Name
SETTINGS.D35EBackgroundSkillsH: Use the Background Skills optional ruleset
SETTINGS.D35EFractionalBaseBonusesH: Use the Fractional Base Bonuses optional ruleset
SETTINGS.D35EPCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for player characters.
SETTINGS.D35ENPCWoundsAndVigorH: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.D35ELowLightVisionModeH: When checked, players who have no token selected will not benefit from any of their tokens' low-light vision (this also applies to darkvision)
SETTINGS.D35PreloadCompendiumsH: Whether to preload compendium browsers on page load
SETTINGS.D35EHealthConfigInstructions: Configure the health computation parameters for the various types of actors.  For reference, D35E Society uses the following configuration for player characte
SETTINGS.D35EHealthRoundingHint: Health values must be whole numbers.  Round up, nearest, or down?
SETTINGS.D35EHealthContinuityHint: Health can be computed discretely or continuously.  Discrete health is rounded at each level, meaning creatures will receive a stable amount of health for each hitdie.  Continuous health is rounded after each source of hitdie is evaluated, meaning creatures will receive a fluctuating amount of health for each hitdie.
SETTINGS.D35EHealthConfigWoundsAndVigorP: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for player characters.
SETTINGS.D35EHealthConfigWoundsAndVigorN: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for nonplayer characters.
SETTINGS.D35EUnitsL: System of units to be used in the world
D35E.ErrorNoQuantity: You don't have any more of that item
D35E.ErrorNoSpellsLeft: You don't have spells left of that type
D35E.ErrorUnauthorizedAction: You are not authorized to perform that action
D35E.WarningNoSizeDie: Could not determine size-appropriate die for {0}, defaulting to rolling {1}
D35E.CreateItemForPowerD: You can create item for power. It will be created with default charges, and using lowest possible manifester level
D35E.CreateItemForSpellD: You can create item for spell. It will be created with default charges, and using lowest possible caster level
D35E.CreateItemForActorD: You can create one of three types of shapechange buff - standard Polymorph, Wild-shape or appearance-only alerting Alter-self buff.
D35E.EnhancementIsLevel: Don't add to base Enhancement Bonus
D35E.CreateEnhForSpellD: You can create Enhancement from Spell either as Charges (eg. for Wands) or per Day use.
D35E.SpellbookAutoSetup: Automatically setup Spellbook properties from Class
D35E.PointBuyCalculatorWarning: The point buy calculator will OVERRIDE the character's base ability scores.
D35E.MaxLevelAutomationInfo: If you enter a value in Max Level field, class description will automatically generate progression tables based on BAB and Throws. Enabling Automate Class Features will cause class to automatically add Class features to Charactes on level up and remove them when lowering level.
D35E.ErrorProblemWithMigratingPack: There was a problem when migrating pack. Check
D35E.LUDSkillsDesc: Skills in bold are Class Skills for selected class, and skills marked with ■ require training.
D35E.LUDSkillPointsAtLevel: Skill points at level 0 (0 + 0 from Intelligence modifier + 0 bonus). Currently used 0.
D35E.UsesNameFromFormula: This Item will have a name updated based on a special formula. You can tweak it and see how it is defined by unlocking custom attributes panel.
D35E.MinionTooltip: You can use any field from Master in Minion by using @master, for example
D35E.NoTokensSelected: No Tokens are selected or targeted. You have to select tokens to use this action.
D35E.UnbindMinion: Sever connection from Master to Minion
D35E.FamiliarNoMaster: There is a Minion with no Master! You need to assign Master to a Minion for it to function properly.
D35E.TimelineInfo: Enabling Timeline support allows a buff to auto-expire (and possibly remove itself from character item list) after enough combat rounds pass. This is best used for short duration buffs.
D35E.ActorSizeDoNotLink: Do not link Actor size with Token size
D35E.ToggleUseProgressionD: Toggling this option can clear up your Skills and Hit Points. Do not use it if you are not sure and you do not have character backed up.
D35E.FilterDescriptionAddAbilities: Type here to filter available abilities
D35E.NotAddingAbilityWithNoUID: Ability {0} was not automatically added to actor because it has no UID
D35E.WarningMissingClass: Your character is missing a Class. Some attributes require a class to function. Navigate to Features - Classes to set up a Class.
D35E.WarningMissingAbilityScores: Your character Ability scores are not set up. Set them up manually or use <a class="point-buy" style="text-decorati
D35E.WarningMissingLevelData: Your character has gained a level but you did not set in. To do this navigate to Features - Classes to set up a Class.
D35E.MagicEquivalentDescription: Material Magic Equivalent is used then determining minimum Enhancement bonus to weapon if a character has a Damage Reduction set to X/Material
D35E.SpellSpecializationDesc: Use lowercase name in case of domains and abbreviations in case of school specialization. Separate multiple entries using comma.
D35E.SpellSpecializationDropSpell: Drop spell from a compendium here to set it.
D35E.DROrDesc: All Damage Resistances that have this checkbox checked will be evaluated at the same time, and if attacker can bypass either one of them, all will be bypasses.
D35E.EnhancementOptionalDamageDesc: If selected, this damage will be added to Conditional Damage instead of static damage.
D35E.SpellSpecialized: Spell from one of Spell Schools/Domains
D35E.CastAsReplacementDesc: This spell will be cast as
D35E.SpellbookDescToPrepareSpell: icon to prepare spell in special Domain/School slot
D35E.AddAllKnownSpells: Add all known class spells for this level
D35E.AddSpellsToSpellbook: Add Domain Spells to Spell Book
D35E.ERLethalDamage: Lethal Damage in case of creatures with Regeneration
D35E.FullAttackDropDescription: Drop Attack from actor here to set it.
D35E.NoPackFound: No Pack found when trying to add item from compendi
D35E.ItemHasUID:
This item has Unique ID set. It is designed to be added to characters only by adding it as class or race ability.

Remember to start your own UIDs with
D35E.PartyMemberH: If checked this character will be displayed in HUD.
D35E.DisplayNonRTSkills: Display usable untrained skills in Summary
D35E.DisplayNonRTSkillsH: Displays skills that character does not have ranks but do nor require training in the Summary tab.
D35E.LightControlledToken: Lighting settings on this token are set using items on actor (like torches or magic items). Settings below will be overridden from actor data. To change this, go to Actor settings page.
D35E.NoTokenOverrideH: This option disables overriding Token image and size from actor, so you can use animated token images. <span style='col
D35E.NoLightOverrideH: This option disables overriding Token light settings from items. <span style='col
D35E.DropChargeLinkItem: Drop Item with charges to link charges/uses.
D35E.LinkedChargeDescription: If linked with another item, this item will use charges from that item.
D35E.ValuePersisted: This value will be persisted between rolls done with this item
D35E.AdditionalPowerPointsSpendLimit: If you select more power points than you are allowed to use at cast time, amount of used powerpoints will be limited to maximum allowed value
D35E.RechargeFormulaInfo: This formula is used when resting to recharge random amount of charges on item. To make item recharge to max, leave it empty.
D35E.RechargeItemConfirmation: This item will be recharged as if character has rested with Recharge Items option enabled. Do you want to proceed?
D35E.LockEditingByPlayersDesc: Locks this character sheet from being edited by non-GM users. This setting can be changed only by GM.
D35E.SortInventory: Cleanup inventory by grouping items with the same name in each category.
D35E.RangeSliderAbout: Range Slider can be used as (@range) in Combat Changes.
D35E.NotAddingAbilityWithStarUIDRace: Racial ability {0} was not automatically added to actor because its UID ends with *. Make a copy of this ability and change its uid to use with Race.
D35E.CompanionLockGM: Lock Companion setup changes from Players
D35E.CompanionLockGMInfo: Character Companion Sync was set up by GM.
D35E.CompanionLockGMInfoGM: Turn off Lock Companion setup setting to make changes.
SETTINGS.D35ECustomSkinL: Use custom Foundry VTT skin designed for this system
SETTINGS.D35EAutosizeWeaponsL: Attack created from weapon will use @size instead of weapon size
SETTINGS.D35EClassFeaturesInTabsL: If selected, all Class Features will also be displayed in sub-tabs in Features Character sheet section
SETTINGS.D35EHideSpellDescriptionsH: Hides short description from spell list in the character sheet
SETTINGS.D35EColorblindL: Changes some colors to use Accessible Palette
SETTINGS.D35EDisplayItemsInContainersN: Display items in Containers in Categories
SETTINGS.D35EDisplayItemsInContainersH: Will display items stored in containers in correct categories as well as in All category
SETTINGS.D35EAllowPlayersApplyActionsN: Allow players to use Apply action
SETTINGS.D35EAllowPlayersApplyActionsH: Displays Apply Action/Apply Damage in chat cards for players. Does not allow them apply things to actors they have no permission for.
SETTINGS.D35ETransparentSidebarWhenUsing: Use Transparent sidebar Background when using custom theme
Uses standard Foundry texture for sidebar Background when using theme
SETTINGS.D35EAutoScaleAttackBABN: Automatically scale number of attacks for Characters using Weapons
SETTINGS.D35EAutoScaleAttackBABH: Characters attack count when using weapons will use automatic scaling instead of Extra Attacks table
SETTINGS.D35EPlayersNoDamageDetailsL: Disallow players from expanding and showing damage details
SETTINGS.D35EPlayersNoDCDetailsL: Hide DC for players on rolls
SETTINGS.D35ERepeatAnimationsL: By default 3.5e SRD disables .webm repeat. This settings changes that so animated tokens can work better.
SETTINGS.D35EDisableTokenLightsL: This option disables overriding Token light settings from items globally. WARNI
SETTINGS.D35EHideTokenConditionsH: Whether buffs should hide their icons from token status effects
SETTINGS.D35ECoreEffectsH: Displays only 3.5e conditions on tokens (unchecked) or core icons as well (checked)
SETTINGS.D35ECurrencyNamesH: Currency names, from Platinium to Copper, divided by comma. Enter any text, leave empty to use default.
SETTINGS.D35EHideSpellDescriptionsIfHasA: Hides Spell Description chat card if spell has Action
SETTINGS.D35ESaveAttackWindowL: Enabling this will save per-item attack window values (wield mode, selected ammo, attack bonus etc).
SETTINGS.D35EDisableTutorialL: Disables tutorial for all players in this world
SETTINGS.D35EApiKeyPersonalH: Your personal Players's Companion API Key - use it if you keep you character on your account
SETTINGS.D35EApiKeyWorldH: Player's Companion API Key used by default for all characters in this world.
SETTINGS.D35EAllowNoAmmoN: Allow no Ammo for ranged weapons
SETTINGS.D35EAllowNoAmmoH: Allows players to use ranged weapons without ammunition
